comments:
When doing rapid stepping, source lookup can fail (thread resumes while 
performing source lookup). The following is written to the log, but it has no 
bad side effects. It would be better to avoid polluting the log with these 
exceptions.

org.eclipse.debug.core.DebugException: Invalid stack frame
	at java.lang.Throwable.<init>(Throwable.java)
	at org.eclipse.core.runtime.CoreException.<init>(CoreException.java:37)

(JDIStackFrame.java:1157)

Isn't this a dup of bug 65604?

Once is source lookup, the other is computing an image. Both are due to rapid 
stepping, so... OK.

*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 65604 ***
